newsitem.title: UK: Benchmark buys 30 mln stg property leasehold.
newsitem.headline: Benchmark buys 30 mln stg property leasehold.

text.p: British property investment and development company Benchmark Group Plc said on Wednesday that it had exchanged contracts to purchase the leasehold of a two London properties for 30 million stg.
Benchmark is acquiring the properties, comprising of a tower office block and 42 apartments, near the Vauxhall bridge, on the north bank of London from Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd.
Both properties have about 82 years of unexpired leashold.
"Based on the purchase consideration, which will be satisfied by cash and bank borrowings, the initial yield on the property is nine percent," the company said.
